com.plexobject.encode

Interface ObjectCodec

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractObjectCodec, BinaryObjectCodec, JsonObjectCodec, TextObjectCodec, XmlObjectCodec

    public interface ObjectCodec
    This interface defines methods to convert object to text and back to object
